SENT.plain: CONTEXT: The puerperal gestational cycle is accompanied by a state of physiological hypercoagulability
Thromboembolic phenomena may occur at this time

OBJECTIVE: To report on a clinic case involving a patient that presented a family history of thromboembolism and developed deep vein thrombosis in a lower limb and vena cava thrombosis during the puerperal gestational cycle, displaying nephrotic syndrome as the main complication
